title: Will Riot give us something for Christmas other then an icon?
body:
I have played league for quite some time on and off, The only thing we really ever get rewarded with are summoner icons...
I believe this Christmas we should get a better reward maybe for people who have got a clean tribunal record.

I have some suggestions here that the public might like:
* 1. *  ***More Refund Credits***
* 2. * 1 Free Rune Page
* 3. * 1 Free Random Skin (A Free Mystery Skin Gift)
* 4. * 1 Free Random Champion (A Free Mystery Champion Gift)
* 5. *  1 Free Name Change

I believe Riot should at-least give us one of these rather then just a summoner icon.

Regards,
Woody

replies.body:
If they do this once, they will need to continue doing this forever from now on. And how much revenue will be lost on Riot's part?

I doubt they will ever do it and it's understandable.

The snowdown challenges, new mode, icons, skins and whatnot ARE the Christmas present.
Riot is not a Selfish, Actually They give me a Pulsefire Ezreal ( Christmas Gift 2014 )

Sounds pretty damn fair that they send us a mystery gift skin. 
If they decide against that, they could include a bundle of potential things from a mystery gift, the best thing you could get is the ultimate skins, and the worst you would get is 300 RP, this way more people would be excited about the game and think that rito isn't all that selfish.

Guys. We all know what present we really want.
URF UNTOUCHED!!!! (Because all other game modes have been moved to different maps, and a twist to it)
For about 1-4 hours on 1  day of the week(maybe Saturday) 
and another thing is that we need a mode that will allow you on customs to play with bots, control their build level and abilities(unlimited gold) control your build, level and abilities so that you can test builds, strategies and other stuff.

omg ... if i had more refund credits .... so many champs would be gone.{{champion:6}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:6}}. Though most of the stuff you listed there almost fund riot with people buying RP to get this stuff. If they did that, it wouldn't turn out well for them. Besides, icons are enough.

You are saying how we should get more benefits because of the length we have been playing but what about the newer league players. Are you saying everyone should get rewarded because they are playing or just the individuals who have been playing this game for years. If this is the suggestion riot would have to scan and find everyone who they think have been playing long enough and then decide what these individual will get.

Although i like your idea it would be too much of a problem to try and reward those of us who have been playing league of legends for years.

You already get something for Christmas, you get to play League of Legends for free. They have given you winter skins that you can elect to buy if you wish to support the game, and icons you can earn for free from the special map they have out at the moment.

Santa doesn't take too kindly to greedy children.

You do get rewards for playing LoL for years, like Judgement Kayle and other season rewards, legacy skins and other stuff that were supposed to be a trophy for long term players.

Well at least now we still have a few.
